repairedDockerfile:
#
# Edge.js Dockerfile
#

# Pull base Ubuntu 14.04 image with Node 0.10.30.
FROM node:0.10.30

# Install Mono.
# See https://github.com/tjanczuk/edge/blob/master/tools/ubuntu_12.04_clean_install.sh for context
ENV MONO_VERSION 4.0.4.1
RUN \
  apt-get update && \
  apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y pkg-config libgdiplus wget && \
  cd /tmp && \
  wget https://download.mono-project.com/sources/mono/mono-$MONO_VERSION.tar.bz2 && \
  tar -xvf mono-$MONO_VERSION.tar.bz2 && \
  rm -f mono-$MONO_VERSION.tar.bz2 && \
  cd mono-$MONO_VERSION && \
  sed -i "s/\@prefix\@\/lib\///g" ./data/config.in && \
  ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" --prefix=/usr/local --with-glib=embedded --enable-nls=no && \
  make && \
  make install && \
  ldconfig && \
  cd /tmp && \
  rm -rf mono-$MONO_VERSION && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install Edge.js.
ENV NODE_PATH /usr/local/lib/node_modules
WORKDIR /data
RUN npm install -g edge && npm cache clean --force;
ADD ./samples /data/samples
RUN sed -i "s/..\/lib\/edge/edge/g" /data/samples/*.js

# Define default command to run.
CMD [ "bash", "-c", "echo Welcome to Edge.js && echo Samples are in /data/samples && echo Documentation is at https://github.com/tjanczuk/edge && bash" ]
